body_html: I think this is something being worked on inside tf.contrib.learn together with Experiment. I don't know the detailed plan though, e.g. whether there will be Bayesian optimized param search method. @martinwicke might know more details.

body: I think this is something being worked on inside tf.contrib.learn together with Experiment. I don't know the detailed plan though, e.g. whether there will be Bayesian optimized param search method. @martinwicke might know more details.
